topic.title: Epstein Suicided
topic.body:
Billionaire pedophile Jeffrey Epstein, 66, kills himself in his Manhattan jail cell, 24 hours after files in his case were unsealed and two weeks after he was placed on suicide watch ahead of his sex trafficking trial

Jeffrey Epstein has been found dead inside his New York City jail cell 
His body was found early Saturday morning, with three law enforcement sources saying his cause of death was suicide by hanging

Epstein was arrested on July 6 on charges of conspiracy and sex trafficking, and was being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center without bail
He was placed on suicide watch following after a first attempt to take his own life inside his jail cell on July 24

Epstein's death comes just  24 hours after court documents detailing his sexual abuse of underage girls were unsealed by the courts

The explosive documents included claims from Epstein's alleged 'sex slave' that she was required to have intercourse with a number of powerful men

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Ｔ　Ｅ　Ｓ　Ｔ　のタ遠ゥ

1565197761_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: been on the internet since 1991 with prodigy. the amount of censorship and propaganda is absolutely astounding compared to even 5 years ago. I haven't really used a chan in 10 years, but i'm running zeronet 24/7 on a raspberry pi in support of free speech, and especially for speech that i disagree with.  fuck silicon valley

> [tonkatuff](#comment_2_1FwMNUe7JTWC62TwvSU4cn8T3uc45gokai): I think the continued implosion of clearnet will continue to drive refugees to ZeroNet. It's only going to get worse, you know? [...]

The barrier-of-entry to the internet back in the 90's is what made it so great. Now any jerkoff with an obama phone can post, which has diluted conversation considerably.

1565229380_1EFZ3dYDWVpD4kF5H9PF83HjPAehE.body: Social media has turned everyone into snivelling moral fags. If you don't like what someone is saying, mute/block/hide or walk the fuck away.

1565329400_194xi8BJsLXhwje1kBJETKo6tjvhH.body:
I don't really subscribe to the idea of white supremacy, but I acknowledge there are differences between races. Do you envision a white ethno-state in america, and if so where?  

Second question.  I've been red pilled on jews and how they have usurped and undermined the us for decades through the banks and media. Is the logical conclusion that hitler was right? How do you explain this to ordinary people that have been brainwashed throughout public education?

1565354906_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1ev.body: Guilt by association. I don't even use 08chan but I seed it because I believe people should be able to communicate freely.

Journalists have private message groups where they coordinate with each other and PAC's to push a narrative. look up JournoList

> [anglosaxon](#comment_15_15eZANwRXZ5hbXJN4fAngLXrSwF7s1CJ4n): They want to shut down Q's autists -- a real threat to their freedom to keep diddlin' kids.

idk man Q autists seem like more of a threat to themselves and what they believe in. What better way to distract a movement than to have them investigate complex theories while holding on to hope that someone else is putting a plan into action?

> [allballsnobrawn](#comment_6_1Kz61HMH26hFwXwRzJoMbHePywcgLCG9fD): This seems to me to be a place worth infiltrating for Project Veritas or some such initiative.Or maybe even an initiative mirroring what (((someone))) did with looking for IPs of people moving to ZeroNet looking for their next place to engage in perfectly legal banter, laughs, and giggles.If "they" do it, it should be perfectly ethical to use the same methods against them right?Level playing field and all that ... (yeah right...)

"No bad tactics, only bad targets" is the leftist mantra so I don't see any issue giving it right back to them. Problem is finding one willing to defect from the church of social justice in the current political climate. It'd be career suicide.
